data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Goianiense GO with the kick-off.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 2, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Goias's half.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 4, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In Goiania, Goias push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Goias.
In the minute 5, Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Goias.
In the minute 7, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Goias have a goal kick.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 8, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Goias.
So close for Goias as Daniel Villalva's shot comes back off the post.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Goianiense GO drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 18, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 21, Goias are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal! Goias have got their heads in front thanks to a Daniel Bessa strike.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 28, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 30, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Serra Dourada, Sandro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 33, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Goias's half.
In Goiania Goianiense GO attack through Edson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Goias.
Sandro is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 38, Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Sandro, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Ratinho is the substitute for Goias.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goias to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Goias.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 44, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO's Jorginho misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Goias have a goal kick.
7 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Goias's area.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Goias a goal kick.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 45, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goias are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio blows against Goianiense GO's Hyuri for offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Serra Dourada.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio blows to start the second-half. Goias with the kick-off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ratinho (Goias) has received a yellow card from Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Goianiense GO drives forward and Marlon Freitas gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 53, Goias's Douglas Baggio is whistled for offside at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO's Jorginho is on target but unsuccessful.
Goianiense GO's Gilvan has been booked in Goiania.
In the minute 55, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Douglas Baggio for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Lucas Oliveira is replacing Gilvan for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Matheuzinho is replacing Hyuri for the away team.
In the minute 59, Goias to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 61, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
Throw-in Goias.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Goias.
In the minute 62, Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goias's half?
Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 66, Ney Franco is making the team's second substitution at Serra Dourada with Victor Andrade replacing Douglas Baggio.
Goias make their third substitution with Daniel replacing Gilberto.
In the minute 67, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Moacir is on a sub for Dudu for Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO's Matheuzinho breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Edson (Goianiense GO) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Goias.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Goianiense GO.
Vagner Mancini (Goianiense GO) is making a fourth substitution, with Junior Brandao replacing Everton Felipe.
In the minute 75, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Marlon Freitas with Matheus Frizzo. This is the fifth substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 76, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO.
The home team replace Daniel Bessa with Miguel Figueira.
The home team have replaced Daniel Villalva with Mike. This is the fifth substitution made today by Ney Franco.
In the minute 77, Goianiense GO push forward at Serra Dourada and Matheuzinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goias defence.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jefferson for Goias has been booked by Wilton Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Serra Dourada.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Junior Brandao's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Goias's half.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 88, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Goias.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Free kick Goias.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Goiania.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Eder Ferreira of Goianiense GO smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Goianiense GO.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
At Serra Dourada, Moacir has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goias take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Victor Andrade.
Victor Andrade is booked for the home team.
